{"id":1097210957,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 days, 8 hours","timestamp":1699789201,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"142 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097210957/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Spending After Buying Items","memory":"60.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxSpending(vector<vector<int>>& values) {\n        vector<int>v;\n        for(int i=0;i<values.size();i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<values[0].size();j++){\n                v.push_back(values[i][j]);\n            }\n        }\n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());\n        long long ans=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++){\n            ans+=1ll*(i+1)*v[i];\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-spending-after-buying-items","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
